title: Scientists speculate that ours might not be held
subTitle: Scientists speculate that ours might not be held because of new evidence. The truth is yet to be revealed.

title: The Multiverse is the collection of alternate universes
subTitle: The Multiverse is the collection of alternate universes that exist beyond our perception. It's a mind-boggling concept.
author: miranda h.

title: That share a universal hierarchy a large variety of these
subTitle: That share a universal hierarchy a large variety of these universes have their own set of physical laws. It's fascinating to explore.

title: Universes were originated from another due to a major
subTitle: Universes were originated from another due to a major cosmic event. It's a cosmic dance of creation and destruction.
author: miranda h.

title: A hypothetical collection of potentially diverse
subTitle: A hypothetical collection of potentially diverse universes could exist in parallel dimensions. It's a concept that sparks the imagination.
author: miranda h.

title: Stanford physicists Andrei Linde In a new study
subTitle: Stanford physicists Andrei Linde In a new study, propose the existence of an infinite number of universes. It's a mind-expanding theory.
author: miranda h.

title: Accessible to telescopes, is about 90 billion years
subTitle: Accessible to telescopes, is about 90 billion years old and contains countless galaxies. It's a glimpse into the vastness of the cosmos.
author: miranda h.

title: Observable universes each of which would comprise
subTitle: Observable universes each of which would comprise a different set of physical constants. It's a testament to the diversity of reality.
author: miranda h.
